channel.title: Deathlypvpz v4 Dung item Jail Problem

item.title: Deathlypvpz v4 Dung item Jail Problem
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“haviland4, post:1, topic:539963”][b]Hey guys when players are in dung if they disconnect or lagg they will be teleported to jail for taken items.

how can i remove this??? its deathlypvpz v4

if(!c.InDung() && !c.inDungBossRoom()) { for (int i : Config.DUNG_ARM) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(i, 1)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<shad=132833>"+c.playerName+" Has Dungeoneering items! Jailed."); c.sendMessage("Hand The Items To a Staff Member or WHOLE ACCOUNT RESET."); c.teleportToX = 3102; c.teleportToY = 9516; c.Jail = true[/b][/quote]Store the Dungeoneering items in an array and iterate through it removing anything they have from Dungeoneering on them then remove that portion completely and replace it with a call to said mehtod.

Read full topic
item.source: Deathlypvpz v4 Dung item Jail Problem

item.title: Deathlypvpz v4 Dung item Jail Problem
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[b]Hey guys when players are in dung if they disconnect or lagg they will be teleported to jail for taken items.

how can i remove this??? its deathlypvpz v4

if(!c.InDung() && !c.inDungBossRoom()) { for (int i : Config.DUNG_ARM) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(i, 1)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<shad=132833>"+c.playerName+" Has Dungeoneering items! Jailed."); c.sendMessage("Hand The Items To a Staff Member or WHOLE ACCOUNT RESET."); c.teleportToX = 3102; c.teleportToY = 9516; c.Jail = true[/b]
